description.description: Natural language description of what PRs and comments to find (AI-powered). Example: 'Show active threads from PRs targeting main in the last week'

repository.description: Repository name or ID (required for specific PR, optional for search mode)

pullRequestId.description: Specific PR ID to fetch comments from (optional - omit to search for PRs)

status.description: PR status filter for search mode (default: active)

creatorId.description: Filter PRs by creator GUID (search mode only)

reviewerId.description: Filter PRs by reviewer GUID (search mode only)

minTime.description: Filter PRs created after this date (ISO format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)

maxTime.description: Filter PRs created before this date (ISO format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)

threadStatusFilter.description: Filter threads by status (e.g., ['active', 'pending'] for unresolved threads)

maxPRsToFetch.description: Maximum PRs to fetch in search mode (default: 10, max: 100)

top.description: Maximum PRs per page for search (default: 50)

skip.description: Number of PRs to skip for pagination (default: 0)
